attributes.action: A General Election must occur within six months of New PM being appointed
attributes.additional_details:
repeatedly swapping Prime Ministers mid Parliament looks bad and makes a mockery of the Democratic principles. While it is in line with our constitution it is not ln line with how people mainly vote (for a Leader/party rather than for an MP). 
By passing this amendment it will make leadership changes less likely and guarantee an election if they do occur

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620016
